jff.utility
Interface JFFParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
JFFParserImpl
public interface JFFParser

A JFFParser take a text line and extrapolates the content described into it. this is the format of a content line:

tag-separator-spaces-data-spaces

the tag is the name of the data contained in the line
the separator is the string specified in the Separator
spaces are optional spaces
data is the information that should be get with the methods get....()

Version:
%I%
Author:
Francesco Fornasini
